semantic_title: Use of Chapter 16 Codes - Maternal vs Newborn Records
section_path: Section I > C. Chapter-Specific Coding Guidelines > 16. Chapter 16: Certain Conditions Originating in the Perinatal Period > a. General Perinatal Rules > 1) Use of Chapter 16 Codes

content.full_text: Codes in this chapter are never for use on the maternal record. Codes from Chapter 15, the obstetric chapter, are never permitted on the newborn record. Chapter 16 codes may be used throughout the life of the patient if the condition is still present. (Evidence: pg no: 70, L75-L78)
content.summary: Chapter 16 codes are never used on maternal records, Chapter 15 codes never on newborn records. Chapter 16 codes can be used throughout life if condition persists. (Evidence: pg no: 70, L75-L78)
key_concepts: Maternal record exclusion (Evidence: pg no: 70, L75)
Newborn record exclusion for Chapter 15 (Evidence: pg no: 70, L76-L77)
Lifelong usage if condition persists (Evidence: pg no: 70, L77-L78)

detailed_rules.rule_text: Chapter 16 codes are never for use on maternal record (Evidence: pg no: 70, L75)
detailed_rules.explanation: Codes from Chapter 16 (P00-P96) are exclusively for newborn/infant records and must never be used on the mother's medical record (Evidence: pg no: 70, L75)

detailed_rules.rule_text: Chapter 15 codes are never permitted on newborn record (Evidence: pg no: 70, L76-L77)
detailed_rules.explanation: Obstetric codes from Chapter 15 are exclusively for maternal records and cannot be used on newborn records (Evidence: pg no: 70, L76-L77)

detailed_rules.rule_text: Chapter 16 codes may be used throughout life if condition is still present (Evidence: pg no: 70, L77-L78)
detailed_rules.explanation: If a perinatal condition continues beyond the perinatal period, Chapter 16 codes can be used at any age as long as the condition persists (Evidence: pg no: 70, L77-L78)

workflow_steps: Step 1: Identify if coding for maternal or newborn record
Step 2: Use Chapter 15 codes only for maternal records
Step 3: Use Chapter 16 codes only for newborn/infant records
Step 4: Continue Chapter 16 codes throughout life if condition persists
